testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "test@example.com" field...............................passed And user fills Password fields "P@ssw0rd" "P@ssw0rd"........................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "valid" "test@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"..............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could not login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "invalid" "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"...........passed And user press on login button..............................................passed And user could not login to the system......................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_Currencies | user could change products currency
testcase.name: user change products currency to euro
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser and visit the home page.............................passed When user click on the top left dropdown list...............................passed And user chose euro as website currency.....................................passed Then all products' prices should be in euro.................................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | user could search for products using product name or sku
testcase.name: user could search using product name
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser and visit the home page.............................passed When user types "book" in search field......................................passed And user click search.......................................................passed Then user route to search result page.......................................passed And there are "4" products should be displayed..............................passed And all products should contains "book" in its name.........................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | user could search for products using product name or sku
testcase.name: user could search using product name 2
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser and visit the home page.............................passed When user types "laptop" in search field....................................passed And user click search.......................................................passed Then user route to search result page.......................................passed And there are "2" products should be displayed..............................passed And all products should contains "laptop" in its name.......................passed

testcase.classname: F04_Search | user could search for products using product name or sku
testcase.name: user could search using sku
testcase.system-out: Given user open browser and visit the home page.............................passed When user types "SCI_FAITH" in search field.................................passed And user click search.......................................................passed And user click on the product...............................................passed Then the product sku should be equal to "SCI_FAITH".........................passed

testcase.system-out: Given user open browser and visit the home page.............................passed When user types "APPLE_CAM" in search field.................................passed And user click search.......................................................passed And user click on the product...............................................passed Then the product sku should be equal to "APPLE_CAM".........................passed

testcase.classname: F05_hoverCategories | user could hover on main categories and sub categories should be displayed if exist
testcase.name: user could hover on a random main category and select whether it or random sub category if exist
testcase.system-out: Given user select a random main category....................................passed When other sub categories are displayed if exist............................passed And user select a random sub category if exist otherwise select the main category.passed Then the page title should have the selected category name..................passed

testcase.classname: F06_homeSliders | user should be routed to the correct url from slider
testcase.name: user could open Nokia Lumia 1020 by clicking it from the slider

failure.message: The following asserts failed: Routed to wrong url expected: https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020 but routed to: https://demo.nopcommerce.com/ expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020]

testcase.failure:
Given user clicks on Nokia Lumia slider.....................................passed Then user should be directed to Nokia Lumia page............................failed
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: The following asserts failed: Routed to wrong url expected: https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020 but routed to: https://demo.nopcommerce.com/ expected [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/] but found [https://demo.nopcommerce.com/nokia-lumia-1020] at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:46) at org.testng.asserts.SoftAssert.assertAll(SoftAssert.java:30) at org.examples.StepDefinitions.HomeSlidersStepDefinitions.userShouldBeDirectedToNokiaLumiaPage(HomeSlidersStepDefinitions.java:29) at ✽.user should be directed to Nokia Lumia page(file:///D:/GitHub/E-commerce-App-Automation-Testing/src/test/resources/Features/F06_homeSliders.feature:6)

testcase.failure:
